actions.name: Trickster

cost.trigger: The user enters battle, or emerges from stealth.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user enters battle, or emerges from stealth.

Effect: The user freely moves up to and using the Movement Score of their choice, and uses Disable (Preemptive).

actions.name: Disable
actions.description:
Trigger: A foe uses an attack.

Effect: The triggering attack becomes @Affliction[disabled] 5 after it resolves.

actions.name: Disable (Preemptive)
actions.description:
Trigger: Triggered by an Ability.

Effect: The target has the last Move it used this combat @Affliction[disabled] 5, else, a random Move is selected.

system.description:
Trigger: The user enters battle, or emerges from stealth.

Effect: Connection - Feint Attack. The user freely moves up to and using the Movement Score of their choice, and uses Feint Attack (Dastardly).
